(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Advertorial) (NNP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ sure)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (MD would)
              (VP (VB have)
                (VP (VBN seen)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Standard) (NNP Chartered) (NNS Ads))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG featuring)
                      (NP
                        (NP (CD two) (NN fish))
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (DT a) (NN restaurant) (NN tank)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nn(I-2, Advertorial-1)
nsubj(sure-4, I-2)
cop(sure-4, am-3)
root(ROOT-0, sure-4)
nsubj(seen-8, you-5)
aux(seen-8, would-6)
aux(seen-8, have-7)
ccomp(sure-4, seen-8)
det(Ads-12, the-9)
nn(Ads-12, Standard-10)
nn(Ads-12, Chartered-11)
dobj(seen-8, Ads-12)
xcomp(seen-8, featuring-13)
num(fish-15, two-14)
dobj(featuring-13, fish-15)
prep(fish-15, in-16)
det(tank-19, a-17)
nn(tank-19, restaurant-18)
pobj(in-16, tank-19)

    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WP What))
      (S

          (VP (VB know)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN fish))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (NP (NNS names))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (JJ neurotic) (NN one))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT which))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ reminds)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (PRP me))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NNP Billy) (NNP Crystal))))
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (VP (VBN called)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP Fin))
                      (CC and)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ big) (JJ hypothyroxic) (NN one)))))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBN named)
        (NP (NNP Barry))))
    (. .)))

nsubjpass(named-18, one-2)
nsubj(reminds-4, which-3)
rcmod(one-2, reminds-4)

prep(me-5, of-6)
nn(Crystal-8, Billy-7)
pobj(of-6, Crystal-8)
auxpass(called-10, is-9)
ccomp(reminds-4, called-10)
dobj(called-10, Fin-11)
cc(Fin-11, and-12)
det(one-16, the-13)
amod(one-16, big-14)
amod(one-16, hypothyroxic-15)
conj(Fin-11, one-16)
auxpass(named-18, is-17)
root(ROOT-0, named-18)
dobj(named-18, Barry-19)

    (VP (VBZ is)

        (NP (CD one))

            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S

                (VP (VBP remember)

                    (SBAR (IN because)

                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (VP (VBZ is)

    (. .)))

    (NP
      (NP (CD One))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NNS restaurants))))
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (MD can)
          (VP (VB get)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ full) (CD 30) (NN %))))))))


root(ROOT-0, One-1)
prep(One-1, of-2)
det(restaurants-4, the-3)
pobj(of-2, restaurants-4)
mark(get-8, that-5)
nsubj(get-8, you-6)
aux(get-8, can-7)
dep(One-1, get-8)
det(%-12, the-9)
amod(%-12, full-10)
num(%-12, 30-11)
dobj(get-8, %-12)

              (PP (IN at)

  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Standard) (NNP Chartered) (NNP Bank))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (VP (VBG getting)
          (PP (IN into)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN dining) (NN scene))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ big) (NN way))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP tell)
        (NP (PRP me))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (NP
                (NP
                  (ADJP (RB even) (JJR bigger))
                  (NNS things))

    (. .)))
